Software Developer

¡Hola! I’m Mark!

I’ve been writing code for fourteen years, primarily for the web, and I’ve become pretty good at it.

I’ve worked with big companies, small companies, and individuals to create great web-apps and sites.

I’m a nerd when it comes to software-development processes and I believe good team organisation leads to great software.

My contact details and skillset are described below, and my full CV is just a bit further down ☺️

Personal Work
My Motor Books
www.MyMotorBooks.com
My MotorBooks is a full-featured stock-keeping and accountancy solution for people working in the Irish and U.K. motor trade. It allows users to manage their customers, stock, invoices, purchase orders, and accounts. I worked with motor-dealers to build the most relevant product.
Dev C.V.
www.DevCV.io
Dev CV is a soon to be released web app that allows users to create graphs describing their career experience. The client is a VueJS application and the backend is serverless, utilising Amazon's API Gateway, Cognito, and Lambda.
